chargeHist.descr: Battery or Threat to Judge, Prosecutor or Law Enforcement Officer

result.execSummary:
The defendant China L Robinson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. China L Robinson is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • China L Robinson was found guilty of Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Fine is inclusive of court costs.  Apply bond.

records.addlTxt: Defendant China L Robinson in court with attorney Erin Joy Larsen.  Rebecca L Sommers appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Court Reporter: Darlene Shue.  States motion is withdrawn.  case has been resolved.  State can not meet burden of proof on ct. 1-Dism w/o prej  Ct. 3-plea  ct. 2 - DRI   State recommends fine and costs.   P-G to count 3   DC   Defense requests $400 inclusive of costs.  BTC: DNA sample and pay for testing   $400 inclusive of Surcharge and fine
Letter to Defendant RE: Bond Monitoring
Motion hearing on August 8, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
to admit Defendant's statements, filed by State.

ADDRESS INFO for China L Robinson
Current: 635 E 71st St Apt 3w, Chicago, IL 60619 United States  (Effective: 11-30-2015)
Prior: 635 E 71st St Apt 3w, Des Plaines, IL 60019 United States

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  You have been ordered to have to provide a DNA sample as a condition of your bond.  Report to the Sheriff's Office Records Bureau. Hours:  Monday through Friday between 9:00 a.m. and 11:30 a.m.   It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any  alcohol.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.  The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Defendant is ordered to have SCRAM unit installed and monitored by Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) - 524 S. Main Street, 3rd floor (262-632-1780.  $208 advanced fee for installment of SCRAM must be paid prior to release from jail.  Make all court appearances on time.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

AMENDED 3/8/16:  REMOVE SCRAM MONITOR.   DEFENDANT MUST BE TESTED EVERY 2 WEEKS.  DEFENDANT MUST ATTEND 7 SELF HELP MEETINGS PER WEEK AND HAVE SIGNED PROOF OF ATTENDANCE AND  VERIFY HER ATTENDANCE WITH ZCI.

Final pre-trial on August 8, 2016 at 08:15 am.
Jury trial on August 24, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant China L Robinson in court with attorney Erin Joy Larsen.  Rebecca L Sommers appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Rose Coulthart.  needs JT date set.  Bond review requested-Requests removal of monitor.  State objects to a change in bond.   bond amended:  Def. to be tested once every 2 week.  Must attend a self help group at least 7 meetings a week.  Must have signed proof of attendance of 7 meetings a week and verify with ZCI.  SCRAM to be removed.  Jury trial scheduled for August 24, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 8, 2016 at 08:15 am.
Status conference scheduled for March 8, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant China L Robinson in court with attorney Erin Joy Larsen.  Bridget D. Brave appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter Mark Garvin.  Waiver of Preliminary hearing filed.  Probable cause found;  bound over.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for January 22, 2016 at 08:15 am.
